issue.title: Model Editor: Joints not properly placed when parts have been manipulated

content.raw:
~~I think I've solved this on 705c0ea, but have to check more if I haven't broken anything.~~

Anyways, I'd like to check with whoever is working on the part inspector (@iche033?), because a) this might have been solved already, and b) changing the part structure will most certainly conflict with the part inspector.

And maybe someone could also tell me if there's a reason why they're being called "parts" instead of "links"...? :]
content.html:
I think I've solved this on 705c0ea, but have to check more if I haven't broken anything.

Anyways, I'd like to check with whoever is working on the part inspector (@iche033?), because a) this might have been solved already, and b) changing the part structure will most certainly conflict with the part inspector.

And maybe someone could also tell me if there's a reason why they're being called "parts" instead of "links"...? :]
